meanings.definition: A person who practices something regularly.
meanings.sent1: The young practicers diligently played the piano every day.
meanings.sent2: The ballet practicers rehearsed their routine for the upcoming performance.
meanings.sent3: The practicers of magic tricks amazed their friends with their illusions.
meanings.sent4: The practicers of meditation found peace in the chaos of everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated practicers of yoga stretched their bodies to improve flexibility.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in a particular activity or profession.
meanings.sent1: The team of practicers worked together to build a new community garden.
meanings.sent2: The practicers of woodworking crafted beautiful furniture for their clients.
meanings.sent3: The practicers of storytelling shared tales around the campfire with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The practicers of gardening nurtured their plants like they were their own children.
meanings.sent5: The group of practicers in the cooking class eagerly tried out new recipes every week.
